Bismarck.Bismarck Cathedral Area Historic Distric: The Bismarck Cathedral Area Historic District, also known as The Hill, is a historic district that is listed on the National Register of Historic Places (NRHP). A first 27.3-acre (11.0 ha) area was NRHP-listed in 1980. The original listing included 47 contributing buildings, including the Cathedral of the Holy Spirit.
